title: Define TaskInfo struct and task status types
description:
Define task data structures:

TaskStatus type (string enum):
- StatusOpen = 'open'
- StatusInProgress = 'in_progress'  
- StatusClosed = 'closed'

TaskInfo struct:
- ID string
- Title string
- Status TaskStatus
- BlockedBy []string
- IsCurrent bool (currently executing task)

Add helper functions:
- isBlocked() bool - returns len(BlockedBy) > 0
- statusIcon() string - returns styled icon (○/●/✓/⊘)
- renderTask() string - formats task line with icon, ID, title

Icon mapping:
- Open: ○ (gray)
- InProgress: ● (blue, pulsing)
- Closed: ✓ (green)
- Blocked: ⊘ (red) - overrides open
closed_reason: Added IsCurrent bool field to TaskInfo struct. Implemented three helper methods: IsBlocked() returns true when BlockedBy slice is non-empty, StatusIcon() returns styled Unicode icons (gray open, blue in-progress, green closed, red blocked), RenderTask(selected) formats task line with icon, bracketed ID, and title with selected/closed styling. Fixed TaskStatusInProgress constant to use in_progress per spec. tui package compiles independently.
